data.title: Facebook and Sony pull out of Game Developers Conference due to coronavirus concerns
data.text: CNBC's Kate Rooney joins 'Closing Bell' to discuss the decline in revenue for the City of San Francisco due to the coronavirus.

data.title: Facebook Makes It Harder for Social Media Startups to Survive
data.text: The size and strength of Facebook is making it harder for startups to get their footing.

data.title: Jim Cramer reviews earnings reports of Facebook, Snap, Pinterest and Twitter
data.text: CNBC's Jim Cramer breaks down the earnings reports in the top four social media stocks.

data.title: Encryption on Facebook, Google, others threatened by planned new bill
data.text: U.S. legislation will be introduced in the coming weeks that could hurt technology companies' ability to offer end-to-end encryption, two sources with knowledge of the matter said, and it aims to curb the distribution of child sexual abuse material on such platforms.

data.title: Multiple Factors Are Likely to Weigh on Facebook Stock
data.text:
An important technical change by Google, and soaring expenses are among the issues likely to weigh on FB stock for the foreseeable future.
The post Multiple Factors Are Likely to Weigh on Facebook Stock appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Here is what's behind Facebook's misinformation machine
data.text: Craig Timberg of the Washington Post joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss his report on "Project Propoganda".

data.title: Don’t Be a Hater: Facebook Stock Still Looks Great Long Term
data.text: Investors relied on their emotions and made a big mistake. They sold FB stock after its earnings report, ignoring its long-term prospects.

data.title: Facebook will pay you up to $5 to record your voice
data.text: Facebook will pay you for your voice, but don't expect to get wealthy.

data.title: Blockchain Industry Should Thank Facebook, Says Digital Asset CEO
data.text: Feb.21 -- Yuval Rooz, Digital Asset Holdings chief executive officer, discusses how his company aims to transform the blockchain market on "Bloomberg Markets.

data.title: Facebook is the latest to pull out of a major industry conference as coronavirus fears batter travel industry
data.text: The coronavirus has caused the cancellation or postponement of more than 24 trade exhibitions and conferences including Mobile World Congress (MWC), the world's largest trade show for the mobile phone industry.

data.title: The Top 3 Internet Stocks Surging in 2020
data.text: Internet stocks are already thriving in 2020, and events like the Olympics and the U.S. presidential election should provide a sizable boost.

data.title: Facebook To Pay Users $5 For Their Voice Recordings
data.text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) will pay users $5 for sharing their voice recordings, the company announced Thursday.
